name: Warehouse Worker: The Game
description:
!!The game is an incomplete prototype!!

The brief chosen for the group was "Warehouse worker".

Given the brief, we decided that the game should take place in an Amazon Warehouse distribution centre, where the player works as a supervisor alongside an AI, which constantly monitors the workers and their productivity. The player's job is to manage and serve as the AI's enforcer when the worker's productivity and efficiency drop or any other issue arises.

The game is a first-person managerial game with a heavy emphasis on the activist message: the warehouse corporation designed the AI to maximise the profit and efficiency of the workers, uncaring about their welfare and basic needs.

The activist component of the game comes when the player has to decide how to react to the AI demands and treat the employees.
